University of Canberra International Course Merit Scholarship

 

University of Canberra International Course Merit Scholarship is awarded to new students, Bachelor, or Masters Degree for admission to a UC Bachelor or Master degree coursework at the university.

Table of contents

University of Canberra International Course Merit Scholarship

Eligibility

How to Apply for the University of Canberra International Course Merit Scholarship

List of Courses Offered at the University of Canberra, Australia

A summary of the Scholarship is given below;

  • Degree: Bachelor, Masters
  • Awarded by:               University of Canberra
  • Deadline:                    Open for Application (Varying deadlines)
  • Scholarship value:      Partial Funding, 25% off total Tuition fees
  • Eligibility:                   India, Nepal, Bangladesh, Pakistan, Sri Lanka, Bhutan, Vietnam, Philippines, Latin America, Kenya, Nigeria, Mauritius, Indonesia, South Korea, Japan (International Students)

Eligibility

  • New Commencing students applying for a 2024 course commencement
  • Students from India, Nepal, Bangladesh, Pakistan, Sri Lanka, Bhutan, Vietnam, Philippines, Latin America, Kenya, Nigeria, Mauritius, Indonesia, South Korea, Japan
  • Bachelor’s Degree (70% or higher in Year 12)
  • Master’s degree (GPA of 5 out of 7 or 65% or higher in Undergraduate study)
  • Full-time student
  • Offshore
  • Onshore
  • Bruce students only
  • Articulation and Sponsored students not eligible
  • Diplomatic students not eligible

Available courses for the Scholarship

  • Bachelor of Arts (Digital Media)
  • Bachelor of Biomedical Science
  • Bachelor of Building and Construction Management
  • Bachelor of Business (International Business)
  • Bachelor of Communication and Media (Corporate and Public Communication)
  • Bachelor of Design (Interaction Design)
  • Bachelor of Engineering in Network and Software Engineering (Honours)
  • Bachelor of Environmental Science
  • Bachelor of Health Science (Human Movement)
  • Bachelor of Health Science (Nutrition Studies)
  • Bachelor of Medical Science
  • Bachelor of Science
  • Bachelor of Sports and Exercise Science
  • Master of Data Science
  • Master of Human Resources Management
  • Master of International Business
  • Master of Law
  • Master of Marketing Management

Note:

  • Articulation and Sponsored students not eligible
  • Diplomatic students not eligible

Value: Successful applicants will receive 20% off the total tuition fees.

How to Apply

  • Go to the University Of Canberra Application Portal
  • Select Student Type (Domestic, International, Research)
  • Click Apply through University Online Application Portal
  • Click on Register (New User) or Login (Returning User)
  • Provide accurate information
  • Upload documents where necessary
  • Submit

List of Courses Offered at the University of Canberra, Australia

Bachelor by coursework

  • Master of Marketing Management
